ðŸ“– Summary: TrackWeight is a macOS application that turns a MacBook's trackpad into a digital weighing scale by utilizing the Force Touch pressure sensors. It leverages a custom fork of the Open Multi-Touch Support library to access trackpad pressure data, allowing users to measure the weight of small objects.
